name: lingocharts
description: A language related data and charts
author: Jan Forst

scripts.flags: node data/tools/flags.js | svgo -p 3 --disable cleanupIDs --disable convertTransform --disable moveGroupAttrsToElems -i - > data/flags.svg
scripts.map: npm run map:geo && npm run map:topo && npm run map:data
scripts.map:data: shp2json -n data/resources/naturalearthdata.com/ne_110m_admin_0_countries.shp | ndjson-map "d.properties.iso_a2 = {Kosovo:'XK', Somaliland: 'SO', 'N. Cyprus': 'CY'}[d.properties.name] || d.properties.iso_a2, d.properties" | ndjson-reduce | node data/tools/fix-data.js > data/map.data.json
scripts.map:geo: shp2json -n data/resources/naturalearthdata.com/ne_110m_admin_0_countries.shp | ndjson-map "d.id = {Kosovo:'XK', Somaliland: 'SO', 'N. Cyprus': 'CY'}[d.properties.name] || d.properties.iso_a2, delete d.properties, d" | geostitch -n > data/map.geo.json
